analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Congress.executeProposal (/unique_chucks/23/0x5f586681e6aaf49b43bc8808b65c4f566249de35.sol#442-474):
	External calls:
	- ! p.recipient.call.value(p.amount)(transactionBytecode) (/unique_chucks/23/0x5f586681e6aaf49b43bc8808b65c4f566249de35.sol#467-468)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- proposals (/unique_chucks/23/0x5f586681e6aaf49b43bc8808b65c4f566249de35.sol#468)

Congress.checkProposalCode (/unique_chucks/23/0x5f586681e6aaf49b43bc8808b65c4f566249de35.sol#398-410) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- proposals[id].proposalHash == sha3()(beneficiary,amount,transactionBytecode)
CreatorCongress.abi (function @ /unique_chucks/23/0x5f586681e6aaf49b43bc8808b65c4f566249de35.sol#474-494) shadows built-in symbol "abi"

Congress.vote.vote (local variable @ /unique_chucks/23/0x5f586681e6aaf49b43bc8808b65c4f566249de35.sol#414-415) shadows:
	- Congress.vote (function @ /unique_chucks/23/0x5f586681e6aaf49b43bc8808b65c4f566249de35.sol#413-437)

Reentrancy in BuilderCongress.create (/unique_chucks/23/0x5f586681e6aaf49b43bc8808b65c4f566249de35.sol#548-574):
	External calls:
	- inst.setOwner(_client) (/unique_chucks/23/0x5f586681e6aaf49b43bc8808b65c4f566249de35.sol)
	- inst.setHammer(_client) (/unique_chucks/23/0x5f586681e6aaf49b43bc8808b65c4f566249de35.sol)
	External calls sending eth:
	- ! beneficiary.send(buildingCostWei) (/unique_chucks/23/0x5f586681e6aaf49b43bc8808b65c4f566249de35.sol#564-565)
	- ! msg.sender.send(msg.value - buildingCostWei) (/unique_chucks/23/0x5f586681e6aaf49b43bc8808b65c4f566249de35.sol#566-567)
	- ! msg.sender.send(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/23/0x5f586681e6aaf49b43bc8808b65c4f566249de35.sol#570-571)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getContractsOf (/unique_chucks/23/0x5f586681e6aaf49b43bc8808b65c4f566249de35.sol)
ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0x5f586681e6aaf49b43bc8808b65c4f566249de35.sol#69)
